Author: Craider
Title: [ANN][BOT]Craider: Telegram bot for trading + BTC signals - 14 day free trial
Body: Introducing Craider  Our mission is to help our community to easily manage, effortlessly grow and efficiently convert their digital assets or cryptocurrencies.  Craider is a next-gen digital platform consisting of a mobile messenger bot (@Craider_bot), a web based portal and a cloud based exchange, all powered by data driven analytics.  https://imgur.com/a/q8yacrU  Craider is made by traders, for traders, that donâ€™t want to miss opportunities but also want to balance crypto trading with their personal lives.  https://imgur.com/a/Fk6y8l7  The Craider Telegram Bot (@Craider_bot) is perfect for on-the-go executions of trades and arbitrages, as well as keeping an eye on the most important news from the crypto scene.  The Craider Web Platform offers in-depth trading tools and charts, and will be developed further to include functions like social trading (copying other traders trades) and automated trading strategies. The web platform is currently in beta and not open for the public yet.  The Craider Exchange is planned for the future, with features like OTC and e-commerce selling of your digital assets.  This is just a small overview of the grand scale of Craiderâ€™s convenient trading tools, for more information please visit our website https://craider.com/    Current Status:  The Craider Telegram Bot (@Craider_bot) is LIVE and has a 14 day free trial period! Currently integrated with Binance, Kraken, Poloniex and with Coinbasepro/GDAX coming soon. The bot will only execute trades through the API of the exchanges, and cannot withdraw your digital assets for maximum security. The Craider development team updates the bot almost weekly with new features!  Features that are available right now:  aggregated portfolio view of all your exchanges buy and sell from your phone on any of the integrated exchanges sample arbitrage for insights on how effective Craiderâ€™s arbitrage algorithm could work for you cash out button that automatically moves all your crypto to USDT with one tap of a button daily newsletter updates from Nextblock.io, an invite-only community of high-profile crypto investors and entrepreneurs  Upcoming features on the short term (1 - 4 weeks):  mini-strategy: Lazy Trader feature - more info coming!  How to get started: simply message @Craider_bot on Telegram and follow the instructions!  https://imgur.com/a/t5bYKy8  [update] 24.07: GDAX / Coinbasepro intergration coming this weekend! Also coming this weekend: BTC signals for the last 24 hours!   Website: https://craider.com/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/Craider_Trader Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Craider/ Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/company/craider/ Telegram Community Chat: https://t.me/Craider_Chat      p.s. this account doesn't have enough posts to embed the images, sorry!

The regulatory body accused the men of profiting from illegal sales of Hong Kong-based company, UBI blockchain internet Ltd.UBI Blockchain is a Hong Kong-based [Suspicious link removed]pany focusing on the Internet of Things (IoT). They started trading around a year ago at just 0.55 per stock since then the price has increased significantly, going as high as $115.   Ethereum   Over the last 24 hours, Ethereum is +4.38% at $471.45 ðŸ”¼Zug, a city in Switzerland known as the "Crypto Valley," has successfully completed its first test of a local blockchain-based voting system. As CoinDesk reported on June 11, the Swiss city launched an e-voting pilot platform built on blockchain technology as part of the city's efforts to embrace the technology. The voting process took place between June 25 and July 1, and stored both polling information and residents' IDs on the system.   Ripple Over the last 24 hours, XRP is +7.58% at $0.492086   ðŸ”½A group of European banks announced they have completed first live blockchain-based financial trades across borders via their jointly developed we.trade blockchain platform. According to an announcement on Tuesday, the real-life trades were executed over the past five days among 10 companies and were facilitated by four banks using the blockchain technology. HSBC, one of the nine institutions that set up the platform as a joint venture, claimed that three of its clients managed to complete open account transactions last week via we. trade within Europe. Author: Craider
Title: [ANN][BOT]Craider: Telegram bot for trading + BTC signals - 14 day free trial
Body: Hello!  Kraken:  1) Login to your Kraken account.  2) Navigate to the "Settings" page.  3) In the submenu, choose "API".  4) Click the button "Generate New Key".  5) Enter the name CRAIDER in the Key Description.  6) Click all boxes EXCEPT "Withdraw Funds" in "Key Permissions".  7) Click Generate Key.  You will be shown the API key.   Poloniex:  1) Login to your Poloniex account.  2) Click on the wrench icon in the upper right corner, and in the dropdown choose "API Keys". If you have enabled API access, proceed to step 4.  3) If you have not enabled API access yet, do so first by clicking the button "Enable API", you will receive an email to confirm the action.  4) After enabling API access, click "Create New Key". You will receive an email to confirm the action.  5) You will be redirected from the confirmation link to the setup page for the API. Do NOT click "Enable withdrawals", CRAIDER does not need access to your funds. Your newly created API Key will be listed here.  Binance:  1) Login to your Binance account.  2) Click the icon next to the "News" section in the upper right corner.  3) Choose "Account" in the drop down menu.  4) Scroll down to find the button "API" and click it.  5) Enter CRAIDER as the key label and click "Create New Key".  6) If you have 2FA enabled you will be prompted for a code, after that you will receive an email to confirm the creation of the key.  7) After confirmation you will see the API key.  You can also find this information in our FAQ on our website: https://craider.com/

Author: Craider
Title: [ANN][BOT]Craider: Telegram bot for trading + BTC signals - 14 day free trial
Body: The world's first bank-backed cryptocurrency exchange is now open to the public after months of delays. Japanese financial giant SBI Holdings formally launched its in-house crypto trading platform, dubbed VCTRADE, last month. Yet, as reported by CoinDesk at the time, the trading service was only available for a group of selected users who pre-registered with the platform last October. In an announcement released on Tuesday, SBI Holdings said the service is now fully open for users aged from 20â€“70 who reside in Japan. However, a registration service for corporate customers has not yet been made available. https://www.coindesk.com/worlds-first-bank-backed-crypto-exchange-finally-opens-to-the-public/  Want more updates like this? Nextblock.io provides Craider with a daily update of important market news. Message @Craider_bot on Telegram to get the daily updates!
